actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A resolution providing that agreements on strategic arms limitation should be submitted to both Houses of Congress.

summary.text: Provides that any agreement on strategic arms limitation concluded between the United States and the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics as a result of the current phase of Strategic Arms Limitation Talks (SALT) should be submitted to both Houses of Congress for approval.

titles.title: A resolution providing that agreements on strategic arms limitation should be submitted to both Houses of Congress.
